name: SKEETER AND THE SKATE STUMP SHOWDOWN
name_original: SKEETER AND THE SKATE STUMP SHOWDOWN
description:
Skeeter will skate... or DIE

Play as Skeeter, a skateboarding stag beetle whose precious stump is under attack! Grind on rails and boost your way to victory against 3 nasty bug bosses. This is a stump worth protecting!

CONTROLS

Switch rails: Aim at a rail with your ARROW KEYS and press D

Boost attack: Press SPACE

Slow down: Hold A

CREDITS

Art & Animation - Jim Quinn

Music & Sound - Packtion

Design & Programming - Sean Wejebe

Made in September 2021 for VimJam 2: Boss
